section.title: Veruca Salt
section.p: Veruca Salt is the second child to meet her demise.
Veruca Salt is the second child to get separated from the group.
They are in the Nut Room where the squirrels crack open nuts.
She is determined to be a “bad nut” by the squirrels. They decide to pick her up and throw her down the garbage shoot.

image.alt: A young girl being carried by many squirrels.

section.p: Once she is thrown down, she gets burned up with the rest of the trash. Her selfishness caused her death.
Once she is thrown down, she is helped out before the trash gets taken out. She will return to the group later.
